pre_caption: The video opens with a full shot of a man crouching on light blue-grey concrete steps, positioned in the left-center foreground. These steps are part of a red brick house with white porch columns and a balustrade, which occupies the middle ground, extending from the center to the right side of the frame. A black metal handrail is visible in the middle ground, running from the left along a sloped grassy area towards the center-right. Green tree leaves are in the extreme foreground, partially framing the top and left edges of the scene, while a tree trunk stands in the middle ground, right of center. The man jumps from the steps onto the handrail, grinding from left to right across the center of the frame, remaining in the middle ground and initially maintaining the full shot. The camera pans to the right, tracking his movement. As he lands on the concrete sidewalk in the foreground and skates further to the right, the shot dynamically transitions to a medium close-up of him. Consequently, the house and porch shift to the right and into the background, while the sidewalk becomes prominent in the bottom foreground. Throughout this sequence, other houses, parked cars, and trees form the distant background, and the camera maintains a height level with the subject.

Adjacent to the house, a sloped grassy area with two clusters of yellow flowers descends towards a concrete sidewalk. A black metal handrail lines the edge of this grassy incline. Beyond the sidewalk, an asphalt street with parked cars, other houses, and green trees form the background. Green tree leaves are visible in the foreground, partially framing the scene where a skateboarder moves along the handrail and onto the sidewalk.**
